sense.def:
Kar je
upside down
, je obrnjeno okoli, tako da je tisti del, ki je navadno najnižji, nad delom, ki je navadno najvišji.

seg.quote: You are holding it upside down.

sense.def:
To turn a place upside down
pomeni vse premetati ali spraviti v nered.

seg.quote: I've turned the house upside down, but I still can't find his watch.
